item.title: Umamusume Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Umamusume Codes
  • How to Redeem Umamusume Codes
  • How to Get More Umamusume Codes

Umamusume is a training simulator where you have to help horse girls win races. Each of the Uma Musume has a different character and, more importantly, stats. So, you will need to train them differently to make them better at racing. To speed up your progress, you will want to use Umamusume codes.

Each such code contains various rewards, including currencies and other valuable items. With their help, you will be able to train your charges more effectively. However, due to the short duration of the activity, you will want to use them as soon as possible.

Updated July 20, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Unfortunately, there are no active codes available right now. That said, things can change at any moment, so it's worth keeping this page bookmarked. We’re actively monitoring for new releases and will update this guide as soon as any codes appear. Be sure to check back often so you don’t miss out when new rewards drop.

Umamusume Codes

Are There Any Working Umamusume Codes?

There are no active codes in Umamusume . We will update this article as soon as codes become available.

Expired Umamusume Codes

There are no expired codes in Umamusume .

At first glance, Umamusume has a rather complex gameplay and many modes and features. But in fact, everything is quite simple since you have to train your characters. It is worth noting that at first, not all possible horse girls are available to you. So, we recommend that you first try to earn currencies and summon new characters. After that, you can start climbing the ranks and progress.

To summon units, you need Carats, which are usually awarded for completing events or achievements. But there is an easier way to earn them, namely, using Umamusume codes.

Codes are a great source of free goodies in this incredible game. Even a couple of them will be enough for several pulls. However, due to the short term of activity, players can easily miss rewards. To avoid this, use Umamusume codes as soon as they are released.

How to Redeem Umamusume Codes

  • First, launch Umamusume .
  • Then, follow the short tutorial if you haven't done so already.
  • When you are given free will, open the menu by clicking on the corresponding button in the upper right corner.
  • Next, select the Enter Code option.
  • Finally, enter the code in the field and then click Ok.

If you do everything correctly and the codes are still active, you will receive a notification about receiving free goodies.

How to Get More Umamusume Codes

If you want to receive fresh Umamusume codes first-hand, you should start following the official social media pages of the developers. There you will find all the news about upcoming events, updates, and, of course, codes for this free mobile game.

  • Official Umamusume: Pretty Derby X page
  • Official Umamusume: Pretty Derby Discord server
  • Official Umamusume: Pretty Derby Facebook page

Umamusume is available on PC and mobile devices.

Da Hood is inspired by the popular Grand Theft Auto series, with the developers also managing to implement the atmosphere of gangster blocks and constant shootings. In this article, Roblox players will find plenty of codes for Da Hood , which they can then redeem to get cash and buy good weapons.

Updated July 20, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of active codes to redeem right now, with each one offering generous amounts of Da Hood Cash. These bonuses can help you build up your stash quickly, making it easier to access various in-game features. The rewards vary in size, so it’s worth grabbing all of them while they’re still active. Keep an eye on this page, as new codes may drop with future updates.

How to Redeem Codes in Da Hood

When it comes to redeeming codes in Da Hood , players just need to follow a few quick steps:

  1. Launch Da Hood
  2. Click on the Treasure Chest button on the bottom left of the screen
  3. Click inside the Enter Code Here box and paste the code
  4. Click Redeem to complete the process

Da Hood Tips and Tricks

To have a good time in the game, players need to have Da Hood Cash. To get Da Hood Cash, they can visit various stores, some of which will pay them for collecting shoes. Alternatively, players can use the above codes, which will provide them with a large amount of Da Hood Cash. In order to avoid feeling sad from the constant harassment of other gamers, players need to find and buy weapons, ammunition, and armor, which can be found in certain stores.

Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Da Hood

Although Da Hood is a fun game, there may come a time when it becomes boring. Often, in such cases, players look for alternatives. And to make it all easier for them, below is a list of the best games like Da Hood :

  • Ohio
  • Arsenal
  • East Brickton
  • Combat Warriors
  • Military Tycoon

About the Da Hood Developers

Da Hood developers are pretty productive, and their Da Hood Entertainment group has over 1 million members. They are also very active on their Discord server, where users can find many exciting things.

item.title: Galaxy Defense Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Galaxy Defense Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense
  • How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

Galaxy Defense is a strategy tower defense game where you will need to protect the Earth from the fall of various types of asteroids. To handle it, you'll have a bunch of weapons in your arsenal that you can unlock and use over the game, ranging from machine guns to huge deadly lasers.

To unlock the best weapons faster, you'll need to earn a lot of Diamonds and accumulate other resources for upgrades. Luckily, you can get much closer to your goal by redeeming Galaxy Defense codes, which will bring you a bunch of rewards that will definitely come in handy.

Updated July 20, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A couple of new codes have just been added, giving you even more chances to grab valuable rewards. If you’ve already redeemed the older ones, now’s the time to check back in and claim the latest offers. We’ll keep updating this guide as new freebies become available.

All Galaxy Defense Codes

Working Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDV10LF - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • GDV10UZ - Redeem this code to get rewards. (NEW)
  • GDV9RK - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDHN80K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9VP - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV9WV - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV7VY - Redeem this code to get Enhanced Alloys.
  • GDV7HL - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds.
  • GDFUN - Redeem this code to get 100 Stamina.
  • GDLUCK - Redeem this code to get 100 Diamonds.

Expired Galaxy Defense Codes

  • GDN70K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDC60K - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV8LH - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV8NC - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV81S - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV82O - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV83R - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV84R - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV85Y - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • GDV6VM - Redeem this code to get six Etching Solvents.
  • GDV6HU - Redeem this code to get five Warrior Chest Keys.

Redeeming Galaxy Defense codes is a quick and convenient way to get rare resources and premium currency. So, if you don't want to spend a lot of time grinding or real money to get these rare items, be sure to redeem Galaxy Defense codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Galaxy Defense

Redemption of Galaxy Defense codes will be accessible as soon as you complete your first training match. From there, you can easily redeem your rewards with just a few clicks, and here's how to do it in this free mobile game:

  • Launch Galaxy Defense .
  • Go to the main menu.
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. There will be your avatar. Click on it.
  • This will open the Profile and Settings menu. Here, in the lower part of the menu, you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field and a yellow Exchange button below it. Now, in the input field, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes.
  • Lastly, click on the yellow Exchange button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Galaxy Defense Codes

You can always come back to this page for the latest Galaxy Defense codes, so bookmark it. Also, you can visit the official Galaxy Defense Discord server. Developers often share codes for this mobile game there, so just be careful not to miss them among other messages and announcements.

Galaxy Defense is available on mobile devices.

item.title: 6 Best Open-World Games About Being A Bounty Hunter
item.description:
Summary

  • Few open-world games put bounty hunting front and center, but Starfield offers a space western bounty hunting experience.
  • Gun captures the spirit of frontier bounty hunting, providing players with arcade-style gameplay.
  • Red Dead Online turns bounty hunting into a full profession with new missions, gear, and rewards, including player-hunting.

Is there a more striking image than that of a bounty hunter? Masked, hatted, and armed to the teeth, these freelance fugitive trackers wield deadly weapons to eliminate the unrelenting and clever gadgets to subdue the slippery. Bounty hunters make for effortlessly cool protagonists, perfectly suited to sprawling open worlds built for exploration, traversal, and sandbox-style problem solving. The "kill-or-be-killed" loop is a cornerstone of game design.

However, bounty hunting puts a spin on the concept that involves a mastery of pursuit, strategy, and restraint. It's the art of tracking a human target to their hideout, taking them down, and hauling them (or an identifiable chunk of them) back for a reward, and sometimes, the quarry needs to be delivered alive. Despite the cinematic appeal, few open-world games put bounty hunting front and center, but these games do it well, each putting their own spin on the life of a tracker-for-hire.

6 Starfield

Space Western Justice At A Stellar Scale

Starfield
10 /10
61
8.2 /10
Released
September 6, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood, Suggestive Themes, Use of Drugs, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Bethesda’s interstellar RPG includes a faction called the Freestar Rangers, essentially space cowboys with badges. The game doesn’t focus solely on bounty hunting, but between the job boards, procedurally generated targets, and branching morality paths, it allows players to carve out the life of a professional tracker for as long as they like.

Such a life typically involves ship combat and zero-G shootouts. The good and bad news about bounty hunting in Starfield is that each bounty is a procedurally generated quest. This means no end to new contracts, but targets can feel somewhat faceless and interchangeable. Bounty hunters who look beyond that will find just enough of a framework to enjoy interstellar fugitive chasing.

5 Gun

An Old-Timey Bountyhunting Adventure

3 Images
3 Images
Gun
Action-Adventure
Shooter
Systems
7.0 /10
Released
November 8, 2005
ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol

Powered by

This early 2005 open-world game is a little time-worn, and it is often overshadowed by the Red Dead series, but Gun moseyed so Red Dead Redemption could ride. Colton "Cole" White begins his life as a simple hunter in the verdant wilds of old America. Through a series of turns involving a shady deal and a corrupt preacher on a boat bound for Dodge City, he finds himself enticed into a life of porting, prospecting, and, more importantly, bounty hunting.

Gun takes no time to chew the fat, as there are no drawn-out conversations or convoluted morality systems, just a poster, a name, and a direction. Bounties can be tackled on horseback or on foot, and they frequently involve shootouts in canyons, ambushes in camps, or dusty duels in the middle of nowhere. This old-timey mid-2000s open-world game captured the spirit of frontier bounty hunting with grit and style, and its stripped-back, arcade-style gameplay delivers the fantasy without too much filler.

4 Elite Dangerous

Track or Be Tracked in a Ruthless Galaxy

In Elite Dangerous , players assume the role of a green pilot in a fully open Milky Way galaxy, charting a personal course through trade, piracy, exploration, or, as many players do in the early game, the bounty hunter’s path. Bounty hunting is player-driven. Contracts can be taken from various factions or collected by scanning wanted ships in unregulated systems, and players cash in on their bounty vouchers with the individuals or factions that issued the jobs.

Identifying the right target, surviving the dogfight, and turning in the kill for credits is easier said than done, especially when everyone else is armed and scanning right back. Elite ’s galaxy is a brutal and indifferent place, and while there’s no shortage of marks to chase, most bounties boil down to names on a list and hulls to reduce to scrap.

3 Red Dead Online

Realizing The Bounty Hunter Role In The Closing Frontier

3 Images
3 Images
Red Dead Online
8.7 /10
Released
May 14, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language, Suggestive Themes, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Powered by

Red Dead Online turns bounty hunting into a full profession pretty much from the get-go. After purchasing the Bounty Hunter License, players gain access to an entire progression track complete with new missions, gear, and rewards. Targets range from petty bandits to infamous fugitives, with legendary bounties offering set-piece pursuits full of ambushes and cinematic standoffs.

Bounty hunting means tracking someone across multiple states or hogtying a slippery runner just before they dive into a river. As well as punching iron into any varment's skull worth more than five bucks, bounty hunters have the "alive" option available to score extra dollars from the authorities, as well as the means (and rope) to do it in a satisfying, realistic, and immersive way. After reaching a certain level, players can ruin lives for fun by bounty hunting other players across the open world, should they so wish.

2 Mercenaries: Playground Of Destruction

Stacking The Deck (With Explosions) And Playing For Keeps

3 Images
3 Images
Mercenaries: Playground of Destruction
10.0 /10
Released
January 11, 2005

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
m
Powered by

Set in an alternate history version of North Korea, Mercenaries: Playground Of Destruction casts players as a private military contractor working for the highest bidder. The target and prize is "Deck of 52," a rogues’ gallery of high-value targets that must be captured or eliminated. Each target comes with its own complications, be it their armored escorts, random civilian cover, or good old-fashioned heavy defenses.

In true open-world fashion, the player is free to approach the mission with stealth, firepower, or full-blown airstrikes. Bringing in targets alive is often more lucrative, but far harder to pull off. While it may not be one of the most influential classic open-world games, Mercenaries still made hardcore fans, who are still desperate to see the series return, out of all who played it back in 2005.

1 Red Dead Redemption

Dead Or Alive In The Fading Wild West

5 Images
5 Images
Red Dead Redemption
8 /10
20
9.5 /10
Released
May 18, 2010

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs
Powered by

Hunting down the former members of John Marston's old gang may be the driving narrative, but bounty missions in Red Dead Redemption are highly replayable, rewarding, and full of variation. Although its sequel arguably does just about everything better and on a grander scale (although some may disagree), the original certainly provides just about the best bounty hunting missions and mechanics a would-be criminal wrangler could wish for, even above the sequel.

Bounty posters line the walls of sheriff’s offices, each pointing to a wanted man with a price on his head. Bringing them in alive pays better, but it’s riskier, requiring players to close the distance without getting shot off their horse. Whether John captures, kills, or lets his targets go, Red Dead Redemption hands over the reins and lets players decide what kind of hunter Marston really is.

item.title: Final Fantasy: 8 Games that Deserve a Prequel, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Final Fantasy prequels could delve into untapped lore and explore conflicts preceding existing storylines.
  • Potential prequel focuses include the rise of the Archadian Empire in FF12 and Braska's pilgrimage in FF10.
  • Prequels for FF games like FF9 and FF6 could provide rich narratives by exploring background stories, conflicts, and historical events.

The Final Fantasy franchise is one of the most successful RPGs in gaming, with over twenty games (including both mainline titles and spin-off games). From the very early days of the PlayStation One, Final Fantasy has been a household name that has delivered breathtaking stories and left a deep impression on fans all around the world. Each Final Fantasy game pushes the envelope with a brand-new world facing a brand-new conflict.

While each Final Fantasy story that comes out is just as good as the last, looking back may be an interesting idea for the franchise. There is an endless amount of lore in numerous Final Fantasy games, and a prequel may be a strong way to explore that untapped potential. Here are some of the best Final Fantasy games that deserve a prequel.

8 Final Fantasy 12

A Focus on the Rise of the Archadian Empire

Final Fantasy 12
8.8 /10
Released
October 31, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Developer(s)
Square Enix
Publisher(s)
Square Enix
Platform(s)
PS4, PS2, Xbox One, Switch, PC
Powered by

Final Fantasy XII is an underrated gem that was overshadowed by previous and future installments in the franchise. While the majority of the fanbase are seeking a remake or remaster of the title, a more interesting take on the game is to explore the past events leading up to the conflict in the story.

A Final Fantasy XII prequel game could focus on the kingdom of Nabaria and give a detailed experience of its decline. A game with the same theme as Final Fantasy Type-0 would make a great structure for a tragic war epic that players must endure to reach the modern day of the Archadian Empire.

7 Final Fantasy Tactics

Players Live Through the Fifty-Year War

Final Fantasy Tactics
Tactical
RPG
Systems
13
8.8 /10
Released
June 20, 1997
ESRB
t

Developer(s)
Square
Publisher(s)
Square, Sony Computer Entertainment
Platform(s)
PS1
Powered by

Final Fantasy Tactics is one of the most popular titles in the Final Fantasy franchise (outside of the main line of games). The story and gameplay are all celebrated for the innovation and attention to detail placed in the game.

A prequel to the game would explore the roots of the Fifty-Year War between Invalice and Ordalia, and while the game could introduce new characters and histories lost to conflict, it could also follow the past events of characters like Ramnza's father, Balbanes, or even take a different political approach and explore the duke's rise to power.

6 Final Fantasy 9

What Ignited the Spark Between the Two Worlds

Final Fantasy 9
25
9.4 /10
Released
July 7, 2000

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Developer(s)
Square Enix
Publisher(s)
Square Enix
Platform(s)
PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PS1, Android, iOS, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Final Fantasy IX has some of the richest lore in the franchise that has never seen the light of day outside of the original game. While Final Fantasy IX was a fantastic title with interesting heroes and villains, a prequel to the series would dive into a magical journey that may even transcend time.

There are countless points of entry for a prequel to the series that could bring the history of Garland to life. Additionally, the game could have a grand scale and focus on the Mist War and the violence that nearly tore Terra apart.

5 Final Fantasy 6

An Untapped Story Full of Conflict

Final Fantasy 6
13
9.1 /10
Released
October 11, 1994

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Square Enix, Square
Publisher(s)
Square Enix, Square
Platform(s)
SNES, Android, iOS, Nintendo Game Boy Advance, PC, PS1, PS4, Switch
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

The perfect setting for Final Fantasy VI would be to explore the catastrophic war that erupted between mages and espers one thousand years in the past. In Final Fantasy VI , the world is nearly devoid of magic due to the war of Magi. Exploring the conflict, traveling back to the height of the Mage Kingdom, and examining how the Espers were abused would make for a thrilling story.

Players could see the beauty that was torn down by corruption in a failed attempt to save a dying civilization, or take part in the war as Esper rebels seeking freedom and justice.

Final Fantasy IV is one of the more expansive and innovative Final Fantasy games in terms of narrative. Not many games in the Final Fantasy franchise shoot toward the stars on such a grand scale while at the same time leaving so much potential on the table.

A second story diving into the origins of magic and the Lunarinans' race as a whole would make a fantastic setting for a prequel game. The game could also focus on the origins of the conflict between the Blue Planet and the Red Moon. While the story would be an extremely high concept, it would make for an incredibly adventurous project.

Final Fantasy XV is a game that spans decades as players take control of Noctis and follow his journey from prince to king. The game did a wonderful job at worldbuilding, creating an opportunity for a prequel due to the fact that there is just as much history behind the story as there is in front of it.

A narrative focusing on the rise of King Regis and the establishment of Nifleheim would make for an emotionally charged story, and with the addition of the current action game mechanics of the Final Fantasy 7 Remake , the game would be incredible.

2 Final Fantasy 8

A Dive into the Past Chaos of the World War that Shaped the Future

Final Fantasy VIII is a cult classic of the Final Fantasy genre that has just as much popularity as Final Fantasy VII. The game's story follows Squall Leonhart on a journey to save time itself as a futuristic god seeks to wipe everything out of existence. The world of Final Fantasy VIII is a desolate plane forever changed by the Sorceress Wars.

This conflict would make an incredible setting for a prequel game to learn how the fire started and experience the turn of the century. In a gritty and action-packed game, a new Gunblade wielder could cut a path to justice or instead carve out a piece of history for themselves and take the player on a rollercoaster ride of a journey.

Final Fantasy X is a game that exceeded all expectations and is a classic among the franchise greats. The perfect setting for a Final Fantasy X prequel would focus on Braska's pilgrimage. With the lives of summoners being very vital to the world of Spira, especially prior to the main game's story, the journey that Braska underwent with Jeht and Auron to bring peace to Spira would be a perfect addition to the Saga.

Jeht and Auron are fan-favorite characters from Final Fantasy X , and further exploring their history and development, while introducing new characters with a deep connection to the future of Final Fantasy X , would be a brilliant undertaking.
